text: Rihanna sparked engagement rumors when she was spotted wearing a diamond ring on Dec. 7! Now, we ’ ve EXCLUSIVELY learned if Hassan Jameel popped the question! Boys, don ’ t cry out your eyes just yet. Even though Rihanna, 29, was spotted with a glamorous sparkler on THAT finger in Madison Square Garden on Dec. 7, she ’ s not exchanging her vows with Hassan Jameel anytime soon. “ Rihanna is not actually engaged, ” a source close to the songstress tells HollywoodLife. com EXCLUSIVELY. “ If she were engaged, she would let the whole world know about it pretty quickly.
